_header: As he that no thing may profit

BLHar682.First Lines:
AS he that no thing may profiteWhat do y now but wayle and
                    crie…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…As for myn howre in which to dieNot settyng bi my liif a
                    myte
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
